title: sAdhu janangaLai
sahitya:
sAdhu janangaLai pAlanai sheyya varuvAr narahariyO puraharanO


anupallavi

  vEdAgamangaLin utporuL ariyAdu vaDivam peyargaLil vIN shaNDai iDuginrOm


caraNam 1    pArthasArathi vandAlAgAdO kapAlIshvaran tandAl udavAdO
paccai maNi vaNNan AnAlenna pavaLa mEniyan AnAlenna
  caraNam 2    tUNil irundu pirandu vandAlenna kaDaiyUr shivalingOt-bhavanAnAlenna
tunbam arak-kaNNan vandAl tIrAdO sugandarak-kandan vandhAl pOdAdO
